subject: Economy
question_en: What is India's approximate GDP at current market price (Gross Domestic Product)?

explanation_en: According to the latest data, India's approximate GDP at current market price (Gross Domestic Product) is Rs. 20,00,000 crore. (Source: https://www.rbi.org.in)
